Package org.thymeleaf.spring6.context.webflux

Class SpringWebFluxThymeleafRequestContext

Object
org.thymeleaf.spring6.context.webflux.SpringWebFluxThymeleafRequestContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IThymeleafRequestContext
public class SpringWebFluxThymeleafRequestContext extends Object implements IThymeleafRequestContext

Implementation of the IThymeleafRequestContext interface, meant to wrap a Spring RequestContext object.

Since:
3.0.3
Author:
Daniel Fernández
